name: Gooeys
description: GOO is the primary token used in the game Gooeys! Gooeys is a Play-To-Earn game from the Dogira Studios team, featuring a fully tokenized economy â€“ where everything from your in-game characters to quest rewards are fully on-chain, and tradable on popular platforms such as OpenSea.
